title: load deck button on duel setup screen

comments.body:
Load and save deck are now accessed via the Deck Editor screen. I intend to move the Generate deck as well at some point. The idea is keep things simple - if you want to edit, update or manipulate a deck then the Deck Editor seems the most logical place to do this. The fact you can only do this via the duel screen at the moment is a problem which I hope to address in future.

**Status:** WontFix
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
